bug.author: bf8086
bug.summary: Make audit log not depend on authentication type
bug.description: Alluxio Version: 1.8+ Describe the bug If audit log is enabled and authentication is NOSASL, any operation will fail with "authentication not enabled" error. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior (as minimally and precisely as possible) Expected behavior Authentication should not be a dependency for audit log. If a user is not identified, audit log should log "N/A". Urgency medium Additional context Can be worked around by enabling authentication but disable authorization.
